lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic is a red hot favorite to overcome all opponents and clinch another Australian Open title this year, although extreme temperatures will be a wild card the Serb has to watch out for.
snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic is a red hot favorite to overcome all opponents and clinch another Australian Open title this year, although extreme temperatures will be a wild card the Serb has to watch out for....

headline.main: Djokovic Cool and Calm About Extreme Melbourne Heat
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Cool and Calm About Extreme Melbourne Heat
